\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{T^X} && {S^X} && X \\
	& \square && {S^Y} && Y \\
	{V_{T^X}} && FX && X \\
	& {V_{T^Y}} && FY && Y \\
	{U_{T^X}} && {U_{T^X}} \\
	& {U_{T^Y}} && {U_{T^Y}}
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{S^f}", from=1-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["f", from=1-5, to=2-6]
	\arrow[equals, dashed, from=1-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=2-6]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=4-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-6, to=4-6]
	\arrow[from=3-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{V_{T^f}}", from=3-1, to=4-2]
	\arrow[from=3-1, to=5-1]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,255;green,58;blue,51}, dashed, from=3-3, to=3-5]
	\arrow["Ff", color={rgb,255:red,153;green,51;blue,255}, dashed, from=3-3, to=4-4]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, dashed, from=3-3, to=5-3]
	\arrow["\bullet"{description}, color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, draw=none, from=3-3, to=6-4]
	\arrow["\bullet"{description}, color={rgb,255:red,255;green,58;blue,51}, draw=none, from=3-5, to=4-4]
	\arrow["f", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,58;blue,51}, from=3-5, to=4-6]
	\arrow[from=4-2, to=4-4]
	\arrow[from=4-2, to=6-2]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,255;green,58;blue,51}, from=4-4, to=4-6]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, from=4-4, to=6-4]
	\arrow[equals, dashed, from=5-1, to=5-3]
	\arrow["{U_{T^f}}", from=5-1, to=6-2]
	\arrow["{U_{T^f}}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, from=5-3, to=6-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=6-2, to=6-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
